thread.title: Pamela
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Pamela

author: Pamela
title: Pamela
text: The customer service at the store was absolutely outstanding! They have decent choices in furniture selection but they need to step up their game if they want to compete with furniture chains like Rooms To Go, Ashley Furniture, Nebraska Furniture...etc. They only offer what's shown on display at the store location.
